import React, { useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import { IMG_URL } from "../../api/api"; // import { IMG_URL } from "../../api/api"; import useAuth from "../../auth/useAuth"; import { CartContext } from "../../layouts/Layout"; const CartPage = () => { const { cart, setCart, addedProduct, setAddedProduct, cartTotal, setCartTotal, } = useContext(CartContext); const { user } = useAuth(); useEffect(() => { console.log(user); }); return (

Checkout form

Below is an example form built entirely with Bootstrap’s form controls. Each required form group has a validation state that can be triggered by attempting to submit the form without completing it.

Carrito {cart}

    {addedProduct.map((product) => { return (
  • {product.name}
    {product.descripcion}
    ${product.price}
    • ); })} {/*
  • Product name
    Brief description
    $12
  • Second product
    Brief description
    $8
  • Third item
    Brief description
    $5
  • Promo code
    EXAMPLECODE
    -$5
    • */}
  • Total {`$${cartTotal}`}

Billing address

Valid first name is required.
Valid last name is required.
{/* */}
Your username is required.
Please enter a valid email address for shipping updates.
Please enter your shipping address.
{/*
Please select a valid country.
Please provide a valid state.
Zip code required.
*/} {/*
*/} {/*

Payment

*/} {/*
*/} {/*
Full name as displayed on card
Name on card is required
Credit card number is required
*/} {/*
Expiration date required
Security code required
*/}
); }; export default CartPage;
